Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the logic for the maze.

      • getPlayerInventory

        public java.util.List<nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.items.Collectable> getPlayerInventory()
        Get the list of items collected by the player. This list does not includes chips (treasures), use getChipsLeft() to obtain that information
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of collected items

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Retrieve the number indicating the level that this maze is representing. Note that once the maze has been created the level will not change.
        Returns:
        the level of this maze

      • getStatus

        public Maze.GameState getStatus()
        Check what the current state of the game is. It differentiate from when the game has been won, lost or if it's still on.
        Returns:
        the current state of the game

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Return an info message cased by the current move. Currently only InfoTile has the ability to generate a message after a move
        Returns:
        an info message or null if the current tile has no info

      • getLastSpecialEvent

        public Maze.SpecialEvent getLastSpecialEvent()
        Check if the player has interacted with the board in a special way during the last move.
        Returns:
        a special event if it occurred in the last player move otherwise null

      • getPlayerPosition

        public java.awt.Point getPlayerPosition()
        Get the position of the player within the board. This is mainly used to optimise the render process
        Returns:
        a point holding a copy of the player's coordinates
